TopicTitle: How can i rotate the COL of a part?

Articles.Content:
when i welded a 252 group of parts together, the COL was off to the side by almost 200m, so i looked through the part config, and found the offset, and i also changed the value below it to be the same... i did that the first time (also added 500kelvin to the max heat), and it screwed with the attachment nodes, but i re-welded the part (and overwrote the original, basically resetting the values), then only changed the CoLOffset, and the nodes didnt get messed up.

ok, so the COL of the part is pointing backwards, which makes for some broken physics where if i pitch up, the craft goes forewards, the opposite of what it should be, and it makes some really unrealistic flight characteristics
